amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $8,500,000,000, not to be derived from amounts of appropriations made available-- (1) by title I ("Military Personnel"); (2) under the heading "Defense Health Program" in title VI ("Other Department of Defense Programs"); or (3) by title IX ("Overseas Contingency Operations").
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 97 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section at the end of the bill which reduces the total amount of appropriations by $8,500,000,000 not to be derived from amounts of appropriations made available by title I ("Military Personnel"), under the heading "Defense Health Program" in title VI, or by title IX ("Overseas Contingency Operations").

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 244 (Roll no. 523).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 244 (Roll no. 523).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Frank (MA).
